channel.title: Glitch?!
channel.description: ok so i added ALOT of npc's to a cave in my server ( i am running a narbscape source) and the path is kinda small but i have space inbetween npc's and i did it all right i added everything the right way. and i even added them in sections to keep it stable but then when i added the last section when ever i walk over there it logs me out then i can log back in but it keeps loging me out. i dont know what i can do and i would like to keep my monsters there but if i MUST get rid of them i will. thanks in advance

item.title: Glitch?!
item.dc:creator: @blue12phat blue12phat
item.description:
@blue12phat wrote:

ty i fixed it!

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch?!
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

it sounds like youve spawned an npc that your cache cant handle

For example if u r on a 317 client,

and you spawn an npc over 3500,

thats what will happen whenever u get into a certain range

So just check the client your using can handle the npc models

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch?!

item.description:
